title: ‘Secret Level’: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Kevin Hart & Keanu Reeves Among Voice Cast Of Prime Video Animated Anthology
description: Prime Video has revealed the voice cast of Secret Level, its upcoming adult-animated anthology series from the creative team behind Netflix’s Love, Death & Robots, which features original stories set within the worlds of popular video games. Arnold Schwarzenegger (The Terminator Franchise), Kevin Hart (Jumanji), Keanu Reeves (John Wick), Gabriel Luna (The Last of Us, […]
author: Nellie Andreeva
excerpt: Prime Video has revealed the voice cast of its upcoming adult-animated anthology Secret Level.led by Arnold Schwarzenegger, Kevin Hart & Keanu Reeves.
text: Prime Video has revealed the voice cast of Secret Level, its upcoming adult-animated anthology series from the creative team behind Netflix’s Love, Death & Robots, which features original stories set within the worlds of popular video games. Arnold Schwarzenegger (The Terminator Franchise), Kevin Hart (Jumanji), Keanu Reeves (John Wick), Gabriel Luna (The Last of Us, Terminator: Dark Fate), Temuera Morrison (The Book of Boba Fett, Chief of War) and Ariana Greenblatt (Barbie) are among the actors announced during the show’s panel at New York Comic-Con. The cast list also includes Schwarzenegger’s son, Patrick Schwarzenegger (The White Lotus), Heaven Hart, Emily Swallow (The Mandalorian), Ricky Whittle (American Gods, Land of Bad), Merle Dandridge (The Last of Us), Claudia Doumit (The Boys), Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje (Lost, The Union), Clive Standen (Vikings, The Morning Show), Laura Bailey (The Legend of Vox Machina), and Michael Beach (The Perfect Couple, Tulsa King). Watch on Deadline The 15-episode series, which will premiere Dec. 10 with two weekly episode drops, features such games as Pac-Man, Dungeons & Dragons, Crossfire, Exodus, Spelunky, Warhammer 40,000 and various PlayStation titles. Secret Level, from Amazon MGM Studios and Blur Studio, is created and executive produced by Tim Miller. Dave Wilson serves as executive producer and supervising director. Here is the list of games that inspired the 15 stories in Season 1:● Armored Core● Concord● Crossfire● Dungeons & Dragons● Exodus● Honor of Kings● Mega Man● New World: Aeternum● PAC-MAN● PlayStation (Highlighting various PlayStation Studios beloved entities)● Sifu● Spelunky● The Outer Worlds● Unreal Tournament● Warhammer 40,000
html:
Prime Video has revealed the voice cast of Secret Level, its upcoming adult-animated anthology series from the creative team behind Netflix’s Love, Death & Robots, which features original stories set within the worlds of popular video games.

Arnold Schwarzenegger (The Terminator Franchise), Kevin Hart (Jumanji), Keanu Reeves (John Wick), Gabriel Luna (The Last of Us, Terminator: Dark Fate), Temuera Morrison (The Book of Boba Fett, Chief of War) and Ariana Greenblatt (Barbie) are among the actors announced during the show’s panel at New York Comic-Con.

The cast list also includes Schwarzenegger’s son, Patrick Schwarzenegger (The White Lotus), Heaven Hart, Emily Swallow (The Mandalorian), Ricky Whittle (American Gods, Land of Bad), Merle Dandridge (The Last of Us), Claudia Doumit (The Boys), Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje (Lost, The Union), Clive Standen (Vikings, The Morning Show), Laura Bailey (The Legend of Vox Machina), and Michael Beach (The Perfect Couple, Tulsa King).

Watch on Deadline

The 15-episode series, which will premiere Dec. 10 with two weekly episode drops, features such games as Pac-Man, Dungeons & Dragons, Crossfire, Exodus, Spelunky, Warhammer 40,000 and various PlayStation titles.

Secret Level, from Amazon MGM Studios and Blur Studio, is created and executive produced by Tim Miller. Dave Wilson serves as executive producer and supervising director.

Here is the list of games that inspired the 15 stories in Season 1:
● Armored Core
● Concord
● Crossfire
● Dungeons & Dragons
● Exodus
● Honor of Kings
● Mega Man
● New World: Aeternum
● PAC-MAN
● PlayStation (Highlighting various PlayStation Studios beloved entities)
● Sifu
● Spelunky
● The Outer Worlds
● Unreal Tournament
● Warhammer 40,000
